snippet.title: Hammer Kid (Gameplay Trailer)
snippet.description:
Hammer Kid is a charming pixel art platform adventure, reminiscent of the good old 16-bit days.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839610

Release Date (Nintendo Switch): January, 22th 2022 (Nintendo Switch)
Release Date (Steam): March, 1st 2022 (PC / Steam)
